name: Detective Sloppy
description:
This is Detective Sloppy!

Play as Detective Sloppy and try to find your friend! Ehm.. How did he look again? People in town should remember your friend right? Ask around then! Hopefully your friend doesn't notice you don't remember him. I wish you good Luck. You will need it.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 in 7 Days

I used:
Unity Game Engine,
SFXIA, BFXR, Audacity,
Aseprite
Music: https://opengameart.org/content/generic-8-bit-jrpg-soundtrack
